ovdesc.p: Record grouping details for consolidation of portfolio fees, both Safekeeping and Management/Advisory.

desc.p: The Id of the lead portfolio for the group.
Should be a valid SEC.ACC.MASTER Id.
Sub-valued field beneath Charge Type. Defines the child portfolio(s) that are grouped together as a family for the given Charge Type.
Should be a valid SEC.ACC.MASTER Id.
Part of a multivalue set. Defines the Charge Type for which the associated portfolios should be considered as a group.
Value of the field can be either IC or SC. IC stands for advisory fee and SC stands for safekeeping fee.
The effective date of the grouping. Defaults to the system date.
Must be a valid T24 date.

Defines whether payment is to be deducted from the parent portfolio (SINGLE) or pro-rated across the group members. EQUAL method will divide the charge for the group equally amongst the members. PRORATA will apportion the charge amongst the group members relative to their contribution to the overall group holding.
Options are SINGLE, PRORATA or EQUAL.
